name: MY 1980's DASHBOARD
description: Welcome back to the 1980s, the good old times for gaming! When games and toys were pure fun and the world was much happier and less complicated!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-7167U  @2.80 GHz, equivalent or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: CPU integrated graphics / dedicated graphics card with 1 GB VRAM Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: ©2018 Pippala Games. All Rights Reserved.
